article: u.s. market research firm international data corporation -lrb- idc -rrb- reported tuesday that the world 's largest web survey it conducted shows diverse adoption patterns despite the fact that web usage and internet commerce have exploded across all unk , cultures and walks of life .
abstract: world 's largest web survey finds differences between countries
